name: Synaesthesia (Iancic)
description:
Two ninjas train together with blindfolds on their eyes. Your task is to use you senses and destroy your enemy. In the maze level you can test your senses even more while trying to find the core of iTec. Good luck fellow ninjas!

For Controller:

Attack: X

Combo: X+X

Horizontal Movement: Left Joystick

Jump: A

Pause: Pause Button

For Keyboard:
